select leaguename,count(*) AS leaguecount, left(issue,8) as saleday from
t_loto_fn_eth t_loto_fn_gto t_loto_fn_uz
where status=1
and leaguename=#{leaguename}
and endtime > DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') and (had_bet=1 ) group by leaguename,left(issue,8) order by leaguename

SELECT count(t.*) from (select distinct leaguename AS leaguename from
t_loto_fn_eth t_loto_fn_gto t_loto_fn_uz
where status=1) t
and t.leaguename=#{leaguename}
endtime > DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s')
order by t.leaguename
